mapper.select: select jpo_title,com_name,inter_date,inter_grade,inter_result,inter_no from interview i left outer join apply a on i.apply_no = a.apply_no left outer join job_posting jp on a.jpo_no = jp.jpo_no left outer join company c on jp.com_id = c.com_id;

select jpo_title,com_name,inter_date,inter_grade,inter_result,inter_no,inter_comment from interview i left outer join apply a on i.apply_no = a.apply_no left outer join job_posting jp on a.jpo_no = jp.jpo_no left outer join company c on jp.com_id = c.com_id WHERE inter_no =#{inter_no}

select jpo_title,com_name,inter_date,inter_grade,inter_result,inter_no from interview i left outer join apply a on i.apply_no = a.apply_no left outer join job_posting jp on a.jpo_no = jp.jpo_no left outer join company c on jp.com_id = c.com_id WHERE inter_no =#{inter_no}

SELECT inter_no,cl_photo ,cl_name ,cl_age ,cl_gender ,re_title,inter_date ,inter_result FROM interview i left outer join apply a on a.apply_no = i.apply_no left outer join job_posting jp on jp.jpo_no = a.jpo_no left outer join resume r on r.re_no = a.re_no left outer join client c on c.cl_id = r.cl_id ORDER BY i.inter_no DESC;
